recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem informasi, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak, Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Fullstack & Mobile Application Developer (experienced):
•  Assist the HPIT team in developing and improving application UI/UX using modern frameworks (React, Vue, Next, Nuxt).
•  Help with API integration and ensure data is displayed correctly on web and mobile applications planned to be developed by HPIT.
•  Support the team in debugging and fixing basic issues on both front-end and mobile applications.
•  Assist in applying best practices such as reusable components, clean code, and responsive design under HPIT guidance.
•  Help in the development and maintenance of mobile applications (Android/iOS) using Flutter or React Native as planned by HPIT.
•  Assist with basic state management and simple application logic.
•  Support performance checks and compatibility testing across multiple devices.
•  Assist with build, testing, and deployment preparation for the Play Store/App Store.
•  Assist and collaborate with backend, UI/UX, and QA while following Git workflows and established development standards.
